mapper.insert: insert into pet_hp(name, tel, addr, stime, etime, park, vet, photo, cno) values(#{name}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{parking}, #{veterinarian}, #{photo}, #{smallAddress.no})
mapper.select: select h.hno, h.name, h.tel, h.addr, h.stime, h.etime, h.rating, s.gno as state_no, s.gname as state_name, c.cno as city_no, c.cname as city_name from pet_city c inner join pet_state s on s.gno=c.gno inner join pet_hp h on c.cno=h.cno order by hno desc

select h.hno, h.name, h.tel, h.addr, h.stime, h.etime, h.park, h.vet, h.photo, h.rating, s.gno as state_no, s.gname as state_name, c.cno as city_no, c.cname as city_name from pet_city c inner join pet_state s on s.gno=c.gno inner join pet_hp h on c.cno=h.cno where h.hno=#{value}
select hno, a_rating from pet_hp where hno=#{no}
